value.title: Data densification in Power Query/ Power BI
value.excerpt: Data densification is basically a technique to densify the dataset or in simpler terms, increase the number of observations in the dataset.   If you want to learn how to do that in Power BI or Power Query, check this video!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Dataflows and power query - November 2020 update
value.excerpt: Have you seen the new and upcoming features released on November 2020 for Dataflows and Power Query? value.title: DAX Fridays! #105: ISINSCOPE
value.excerpt: The DAX function ISINSCOPE, allow us to work with hierarchies in Power BI. In this video I will go through an example on how to do that. This DAX function was introduced in the November 2018 Power BI Desktop Update, so make sure you have that installed if you wan to test it out.  Other resources:  DAX

In today's video I will show you how to calculate how much you need to sale per month to achieve your sales target for
